summary: REQ-14 appears addressed by adding a new production domain value "for-my-yellow". The diff adds frontend-side asset URL handling and error boundary changes that may help runtime robustness, but it does not provide evidence that the generic production deployment error (REQ-15) is actually identified/fixed, nor that the required static assets are present at the specified paths (REQ-16). Additionally, backend/main.mo was replaced with an empty actor, which was not requested and may be risky given the architecture constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Investigate and fix the generic "Production deployment error: Deployment error" by identifying the failing step and correcting the underlying issue so the current Version 3 build can successfully deploy to production.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows frontend robustness changes (ErrorBoundary, asset URL helper) and a domain text file, but does not show any concrete deployment pipeline/config fix or evidence of the failing step being identified/corrected to ensure production deployment succeeds.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that all static assets referenced by the UI are present at their expected paths and load successfully in production (including the hero photo at "/assets/file_0000000085ec71fa9b0ffc17f2cf245d-1.png", the generated mascot at "/assets/generated/cute-mascot.dim_900x900.png", and the background music at "/assets/audio/romantic-background.mp3"). Fix any missing/incorrect paths or missing files.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff updates code to build asset URLs via a new helper and references the mascot and MP3 via assetUrl(), but does not add/modify the actual asset files under a public/assets directory, nor does it show the hero photo reference being verified/fixed (ProposalPage asking-state section is truncated).

hallucinated_features.description: Replaced backend Motoko canister implementation with an empty `actor {}`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on deployment blockers and frontend static asset path/domain issues; it does not request removing backend logic. This change may violate the constraint to respect existing single-actor backend architecture and keep Motoko logic in backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a global React ErrorBoundary UI that shows a refresh page screen on error.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested in REQ-14/15/16. While it could reduce runtime breakage, it is additional functionality beyond the stated requirements.
